dcterms:description: The MM-WHS dataset consists of 20 cardiac CT volumes with expert labels for 7 cardiac structures: left ventricle (LV), left atrium (LA), right ventricle (RV), right atrium (RA), myocardium (MYO), ascending aorta (AA), and pulmonary artery (PA). The dataset was used for semi-supervised cardiac image segmentation experiments.
dcterms:title: MM-WHS (Multi-Modality Whole Heart Segmentation)
